vclaim: A photograph shared to Reddit in June 2021 showed the original, colorful state of China’s terracotta soldiers before environmental conditions rapidly deteriorated residual paint.
title: Does This Pic Show True Colors of Terracotta Soldiers Before ‘Rapid Deterioration’?
subtitle: Thousands of life-sized statues are thought to remain housed in the 2,000-year-old tomb.
author: Madison Dapcevich
